mapper.select: SELECT b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.publication_date AS publicationDate, b.price, b.copies_available AS copiesAvailable, b.detail, b.category, b.image, b.created_at AS createdAt FROM book b WHERE b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{title}, ' ', ''), '%')

SELECT b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.price, b.detail, b.category FROM book b JOIN review r ON b.isbn = r.book_isbn GROUP BY b.isbn, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, b.price, b.detail, b.category ORDER BY AVG(r.rate) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT r.user_id, r.book_isbn, r.content, r.rate, r.`like`, r.rate, r.updated_at FROM review r WHERE r.book_isbn = #{isbn}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT dc.user_id) AS participantCount FROM discussion d JOIN discussion_comment dc ON d.id = dc.discussion_id WHERE d.book_isbn = #{isbn}
SELECT IFNULL(rate, 'result') AS 'rate', COUNT(rate) 'count', AVG(rate) AS 'avg' FROM review WHERE book_isbn = #{isbn} GROUP BY rate with rollup

SELECT * FROM book b
ORDER BY b.publication_date DESC
ORDER BY b.title ASC
ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{pageInfo.size} OFFSET #{pageInfo.offset}
